name: MAW
description: What is the project about? The Mountain Sea World (MSW) Network is a decentralized MultiChain game data and service relay network (middleware). What makes your project unique? Mountain Sea World (MSW) Network offers a simple, user-friendly, and cost-effective Application Programming Interface (API). This API allows chain game developers to deploy their games quickly while significantly reducing interaction costs for players. History of your project. In August 2022, after a year of intensive development and layout, the Mountain Sea team successfully established the complete commercial ecosystem of Mountain Sea World. And received support and attention from various institutions, including South Korea's top blockchain project Klaytn and renowned investor Richard Wang, and successfully completed angel round financing. Whatâ€™s next for your project? Officially release the chain game "Mountain Sea World", and develop more games on MSW official aggregated platform - GameLand. What can your token be used for? MAW playing a crucial role in platform governance. It allows participants to engage in Gameland platform governance and decision-making, making the platform's operations and development more transparent and democratic. Additionally, users holding MAW may also enjoy the privilege of being whitelisted on the exchange, gaining access to certain benefits and special treatment on the exchange.
